trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
Creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView> with the provided data source designer.
The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner"></xref> object.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports deletes.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if deletes are supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports inserts.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if inserts are supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports paging through data returned by a query.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports a sorted view of the underlying data source.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if sorting is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports updates.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if updates are supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control by using the specified number of rows.
Returns a value that indicates whether the data is sample or real data.
The minimum number of rows to return.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
The data to display at design time.
Gets the schema that describes the data source view that is represented by the current view object.
An object that represents the schema.
